directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Add carrot, shallot, and celery; cook and stir until fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes. Add Romanesco broccoli and potatoes.
Pour hot water into the saucepan. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, covered, until broccoli and potatoes are soft, about 40 minutes. Puree soup with an immersion blender until smooth.
ingredients: 3 1/2 ounces Romanesco broccoli, tough parts discarded, chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Crema di Cavolo Romanesco (Romanesco Broccoli Soup)
